title: Olive Oil Benefits
notes: QUOTE: "Extra virgin olive oil is rich in monounsaturated fatty acids and polyphenols, which have been shown in numerous studies to reduce inflammation and improve cardiovascular health. title: Honey's Healing Properties
notes: QUOTE: "Honey has been used as a wound dressing for thousands of years. Modern research has confirmed its antibacterial properties, particularly against MRSA and other resistant bacteria. The high sugar content creates an osmotic effect that draws fluid from wounds, while its low pH and hydrogen peroxide content provide additional antimicrobial activity." - Dr. Peter Molan, M.B.E., Professor of Biochemistry at the University of Waikato, New Zealand

title: Discovery of Iron from Space
notes: QUOTE: "Iron is formed in the cores of massive stars through nuclear fusion processes. title: The Forelock and Brain Function
notes: QUOTE: "The Quranic reference to the forelock as 'lying, sinful' (Quran 96:16) corresponds to modern neuroscience findings about the prefrontal cortex. This brain region controls decision-making, impulse control, and can be associated with deception and sinful behavior. Modern neuroscience confirms this brain region's role in moral decision-making." - Dr. Keith Moore, Professor of Anatomy, University of Toronto
